column2: "I thought if I could talk to 'em, it would be worth a shot, you know? Maybe they know something about my missing person."
"But I guess we'll have to get rid of the Darkers first."
"What do you say, partner? Let's go hunt some Kartargots over in the Volcanic Caverns!"
"Who knows how it'll turn out if I go alone? But, with you by my side, it'll be a piece of cake!"

"<yellow>*This Client Order with Afin will be easier to complete if you set a password in the \"Enter Party Info\" menu and select the \"Limit multiplayer requests from other parties\" option when accepting it.<c>"
